name: OWANBE PROJECT
description:
“Owanbe” or “Owambe” is defined by urban dictionary as a large grandiose party thrown by Nigerians that involves a lot of food, dancing, loud music and spraying (the Nigerian act of throwing money on a dancing person); it is seen as a way of appreciating the celebrant.


This UI project came into being when I thought of how people can be able to know which Ówànbè is available and in order to help people locate various Ówànbè parties available in their vicinity in order to alleviate boredom. Ówànbè will run an Extensive search algorithm while compiling peoples recent social media post in order to determine the availabilty of an Ówànbè if it happens to be brought to life.
